channel.title: Organization on NollmannLab helpdesk
channel.description: Recent content in Organization on NollmannLab helpdesk

item.title: Alarm procedure @CBS60
item.description: Alarm Indoor alarm activation : 6:30am-21pm A beep sounds 15min before the alarm is triggered. Deactivate alarm that is going to be activated At 20h45 it starts beeping Type the code once (ask code to manager), then wait, alarm says it is armed Then type it once more, the alarm should say it is disarmed Repeat the procedure for another zone When you leave, just type the code once to activate it.

item.title: Conferences
item.description: Conferences This website describes the current and upcoming conferences in the field Bacteria Eukaryotes Probabilistic Modeling In Genomics April 14 - 16, 2021 Virtual Abstract Deadline: January 22, 2021 Link The Identity and Evolution of Cell Types 5 - 8 May 2021 Deadlines: Registration - 7 Apr 2021 Abstract - 10 Mar 2021 Link Chromatin and Epigenetics Deadlines: 17 - 20 May 2021 Registration - 19 Apr 2021

item.title: Deliveries
item.description: Deliveries Parcels are dropped off by the deliveryman at the reception desk. - The recipient of the package or the person in charge of the order should be notified by the reception service. → scan the delivery note and send it to “commande@cbs.cnrs.fr”. (address in memory on the corridor’s printer-scanner) → Deposit the Bon de Livraison in the tray provided for this purpose near the printer.
